backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing access control, user profiles, blob storage, and CRUD operations for equipment, assignments, issues, sessions, and activity logs with role‑based permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing required updates to App.tsx for auth-based navigation and related component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of major frontend files and components.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_APK_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder with prerequisites and step-by-step instructions.
frontend/docs/APK_BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Detailed instructions for building the Ramp Track Android APK via PWABuilder or Bubblewrap, including required PWA readiness and configuration.
frontend/docs/APK_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Guide for deploying the generated Android APK, covering prerequisites and distribution methods.
frontend/docs/APK_DOWNLOAD_LINK.md: Short guide explaining how to host and distribute the generated APK, including GitHub Releases instructions.
frontend/docs/APK_QUICK_START.md: Quick-start guide for generating an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder in minutes.
frontend/docs/INCIDENT_REPORT.md: Incident report documenting credit overuse, deployment failures, scanner issues, and requests for technical and billing intervention.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file configuring PWA metadata, preloaded assets, ZXing loader, root mount point, and service worker auto-update logic.
frontend/index.ts: Snippet decoding image data for QR scanning using a reader instance.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines PWA metadata, icons, shortcuts, and share target configuration for Ramp Track.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a service worker with versioned caching, network-first navigation, and selective request bypassing for build and API assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing auth state, hash-based navigation, and refresh overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentQRScann: Provides a camera-based QR scanning UI with torch control, error states, and callbacks for login or equipment scanning.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary that displays a full-screen error UI with diagnostics, reload, and cache-clearing actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles user login via username/password or badge scan, integrating with AuthContext and a QR scanner.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Renders a 404 page with a background image and a button that navigates home via callback or redirect.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PWAUpdateNotific: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ReconnectingOver: Shows a modal overlay with a spinner during session refresh and supports delayed dismissal.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Displays role selection UI using images and shows the signed‑in user's name from auth context.
frontend/src/components/SignOnScreen.tsx: Provides login route options based on user roles and redirects back if no user is present.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows a full‑screen splash image with a loading spinner and status text.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Manages authentication state, session hydration, login, logout, and session refresh using localStorage.
frontend/src/data/gates.ts: Exports a static readonly list of gate coordinate objects with lat/lon and radius values.
frontend/src/data/userRoster.ts: Contains the full static user roster used for validating logins and badge scans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for reading and mutating equipment, assignments, and issues using the actor with authentication checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining light/dark themes and touch‑friendly UI variables for the app.
frontend/src/lib/apiClient.ts: Implements a centralized authenticated fetch wrapper with token handling, refresh state tracking, and structured error responses.
frontend/src/lib/auditLog.ts: Manages local audit log storage for scan events, including adding, retrieving, filtering, and clearing events with user data resolution.
frontend/src/lib/autoGateLocator.ts: Provides GPS-based nearest-gate detection using Haversine distance and returns a gate label or 'Out of area'.
frontend/src/lib/ensureUserContext.ts: Retrieves user context from localStorage with fallbacks and validates sessions without clearing local auth on backend errors.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentHistory.ts: Implements an in-memory log of equipment events with functions to add, query, and clear history.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentRegistry.ts: Manages client-side equipment records with localStorage persistence, ID normalization, initialization, and status/history updates.
frontend/src/lib/parseBadge.ts: Extracts the longest digit sequence from scanner input as a badge ID, returning null if under four digits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard showing equipment, assignments, audit logs, and update tools with filtering and periodic refresh.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInScreen.tsx: Implements equipment check-in with scanning, validation, GPS capture, and backend logging.
frontend/src/pages/CheckOutScreen.tsx: UI flow for scanning equipment, validating availability, capturing GPS, and creating a checkout assignment.
frontend/src/pages/DEBUG_SAFE.tsx: Simple debug page confirming root app boot.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentDetailScreen: Displays equipment details and history with status badges and fallback when not found.
frontend/src/pages/ManageEquipmentScreen: Allows adding, editing, and searching equipment records with session validation.
frontend/src/pages/OperatorHomeScreen.ts: Main operator menu providing navigation to checkout, return, and issue reporting actions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIssueScreen.tsx: Workflow for scanning equipment, entering issue details, capturing photos, and submitting an issue report.
frontend/src/pages/SignInScreen.tsx: React login screen handling operator/admin modes, credential input, and AuthContext login with localStorage persistence and conditional rendering based on auth state.
frontend/src/types/zxing.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for ZXingBrowser global barcode/QR reader APIs loaded from CDN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and modify hash parameters without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, architecture, and known issues for the Ramp Track app.
unknown.bash: Simple script that navigates to the frontend directory and runs the build command.
unknown.txt: Instructions for hosting, installing, and using an Android APK build of the Ramp Track app with troubleshooting and feature notes.
